newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Swiss franc recovers some to end higher.
newsitem.headline: Swiss franc recovers some to end higher.

text.p: 1545 GMT - The Swiss franc firmed to close higher against the dollar and mark as stop-loss orders were triggered by a thin market testing the lower end of the U.S. and German units. * Dollar ends at 1.3140/3145 Swiss francs vs opening 1.3205/3215 and Tuesday close of 1.3247/3267. * Mark closes at 85.21/22 centimes vs 85.47/49 at the start and prior closing 85.38/41 * Sterling eased farther, closing at 2.1749/1779 Swiss francs after opening at 2.1835/1869 and overnight 2.1886/1911.
* Traders said overnight dollar/Swiss should stay above 1.3060 and top out at 1.3150. Mark expected to range between 85.11 and 85.45.
